results.question: Which actors made up the trio in "The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly"?
results.correct_answer: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, and Lee Van Cleef
incorrect_answers: Sergio Leone, Ennio Morricone, and Tonino Delli Colli
Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, and Charles Bronson
Aldo Giuffrè, Mario Brega, and Luigi Pistilli
